titleStmt.title: The Pourtraiture of His royal Highness, Oliver late Lord Protector &c. in his life and death with a short view of his government, as also a description of his standing and lying in state at Sommerset-House, and the manner of his funeral solemnity on Tuesday November 23.
titleStmt.author: H. D. (Henry Dawbeny)

titleStmt.title: The Pourtraiture of His royal Highness, Oliver late Lord Protector &c. in his life and death with a short view of his government, as also a description of his standing and lying in state at Sommerset-House, and the manner of his funeral solemnity on Tuesday November 23.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.N. for Edward Thomas, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Engraved frontispiece of Cromwell opposite t.p.
Attributed to Henry Dawbeny by Wing.
Item at reel 1642:3 identified as Wing P3004 (number cancelled).
Reproductions of original in the British Library.
